title: Best of The Herd: 7/28/20
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 7/28/20
description:
The MLB season isn't in danger of ending, the Patriots are rebooting the franchise, Colin speaks out against Jimmy Garoppolo slander, the Clippers are built for the playoffs and Colin finds it ridiculous Carson Wentz isn't in the top 100 list.

Guest: HOF NBA player/Inside the NBA analyst Charles Barkley

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
